HADS (Hostile Action Displacement System)
When the HADS is activated and a hostile mob comes to close to the TARDIS, the TARDIS will take off, 10 minutes later, the TARDIS will automatically land in the same spot it took off it
Note: when the TARDIS dematerializes due to the HADS being triggered it immediately goes into vortex limbo, meaning you don't need to worry about flight events destroying your subsystems
Cancelling HADS:
Right clicking the ground while in TARDIS Destination mode of an attuned Sonic Screwdriver will force the TARDIS to land, even when in HADS
